thread.title: Jeremy Kyle reveals he’s ‘very happy’ with nanny lover after splitting from wife of 13 years, as he flirts with Katie Price AGAIN on Loose Women
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle reveals he’s ‘very happy’ with nanny lover after splitting from wife of 13 years, as he flirts with Katie Price AGAIN on Loose Women

author: Rebecca Pocklington
title: Jeremy Kyle reveals he’s ‘very happy’ with nanny lover after splitting from wife of 13 years, as he flirts with Katie Price AGAIN on Loose Women
text:
TV Magazine 'IT'S A NEW CHAPTER' Jeremy Kyle reveals he’s ‘very happy’ with nanny lover after splitting from wife of 13 years, as he flirts with Katie Price AGAIN on Loose Women 
The ITV chat show host insisted it's time to "get on with our lives" as he opened up on his new relationship By REBECCA POCKLINGTON
